thread.title: BREAKING: Trump calls for all willing state governors to deploy their national guards
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Trump calls for all willing state governors to deploy their national guards

author: GeorgiaPeach
title: BREAKING: Trump calls for all willing state governors to deploy their national guards
text: Results 1 to 10 of 10 Thread: [BREAKING: Trump calls for all willing state governors to deploy their national guards](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/) Thread Information Users Browsing this Thread There are currently 8 users browsing this thread. (1 members and 7 guests) - 01-25-2024, 05:36 PM [#1](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745932) BREAKING: Trump calls for all willing state governors to deploy their national guards (Read Statement at link) Jack Poso [@JackPosobiec](https://twitter.com/JackPosobiec) [16m](https://twitter.com/JackPosobiec/status/1750629364872421822) BREAKING: Trump calls for all willing state governors to deploy their national guards to Texas and to remove the illegals back across the border (From Statement) “Joe Biden has surrendered our Border, and is aiding and abetting a massive Invasion of millions of Illegal Migrants into the United States.”“Instead of fighting to protect our Country from this onslaught, Biden is, unbelievably, fighting to tie the hands of Governor Abbott and the State of Texas, so that the Invasion continues unchecked.”“We encourage all willing States to deploy their guards to Texas to prevent the entry of Illegals, and to remove them back across the Border.”“All Americans should support the commonsense measures by Texas authorities to protect the Safety, Security, and Sovereignty of Texas, and of the American people.” [https://twitter.com/JackPosobiec/sta...29364872421822](https://twitter.com/JackPosobiec/status/1750629364872421822) Last edited by GeorgiaPeach; 01-25-2024 at 05:58 PM.Matthew 19:26 But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible. Join our efforts to Secure America's Borders and End Illegal Immigration by [Joining ALIPAC's E-Mail Alerts network (CLICK HERE)](https://eepurl.com/cktGTn) - 01-25-2024, 05:41 PM [#2](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745935) [Bill Melugin](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_) [@BillMelugin_](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_) NEW: Trump comments on the ongoing feud between Texas and the Feds at the border. Encourages willing states to send their National Guard soldiers to Texas to “prevent entry of illegals, and to remove them back across the border.” Says on day one in office would stand with Texas. [https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_/sta...26395926221218](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_/status/1750626395926221218)Matthew 19:26 But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible. Join our efforts to Secure America's Borders and End Illegal Immigration by [Joining ALIPAC's E-Mail Alerts network (CLICK HERE)](https://eepurl.com/cktGTn) - 01-25-2024, 05:41 PM [#3](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745936) No more welcome wagon. The N.G. must build the concertina wire...10 rows deep and start building a sea wall on the shores to keep them climbing up the banks of the river. ILLEGAL ALIENS HAVE "BROKEN" OUR IMMIGRATION SYSTEM DO NOT REWARD THEM - DEPORT THEM ALL - 01-25-2024, 05:45 PM [#4](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745937) [Bill Melugin](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_) [@BillMelugin_](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_) Updated list of states announcing they stand w/ Texas in border dispute w/ federal government. Florida, Georgia North Dakota South Dakota Tennessee Alabama Montana Idaho Utah West Virginia Oklahoma Nebraska Louisiana Several of these states have also previously sent physical help. State troopers, etc. House Speaker [@MikeJohnson](https://twitter.com/MikeJohnson) has also announced he will support TX. Last edited [12:53 PM · Jan 25, 2024](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_/status/1750577696210616471/history) [https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_/sta...77696210616471](https://twitter.com/BillMelugin_/status/1750577696210616471) Last edited by GeorgiaPeach; 01-25-2024 at 05:49 PM.Matthew 19:26 But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible. Join our efforts to Secure America's Borders and End Illegal Immigration by [Joining ALIPAC's E-Mail Alerts network (CLICK HERE)](https://eepurl.com/cktGTn) - 01-25-2024, 05:48 PM [#5](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745939) Now these states need to sign an ORDER to cut off all state taxpayer funded benefits to illegal aliens. No illegal aliens shall collect any benefits on behalf of a minor. Deport the whole family. These states must REFUSE to acknowledge driver's licenses issued to illegal aliens from sanctuary states! Arrest them, impound the vehicle, and deport them. Just like states pass different Concealed Carry laws, those laws are not honored in non-concealed carry states! Same with these driver's licenses issued to illegal aliens. Deem them NULL & VOID. Updated list of states announcing they stand w/ Texas in border dispute w/ federal government. Florida Virginia Georgia North Dakota South Dakota Tennessee Alabama Montana Idaho Utah West Virginia Oklahoma Nebraska Louisiana Several of these states have also previously sent physical help. State troopers, etc. Last edited by Beezer; 01-25-2024 at 05:52 PM.ILLEGAL ALIENS HAVE "BROKEN" OUR IMMIGRATION SYSTEM DO NOT REWARD THEM - DEPORT THEM ALL - 01-25-2024, 05:50 PM [#6](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745940) Hi Beezer. Hopefully the list will grow and Governor Abbott will remain strong. Please add more States to this thread if you see them. Thank you. Join our efforts to Secure America's Borders and End Illegal Immigration by [Joining ALIPAC's E-Mail Alerts network (CLICK HERE)](https://eepurl.com/cktGTn) - 01-25-2024, 05:57 PM [#8](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745943) They are sleeping in our airports in the hundreds of thousands in many cities! This is a fire code violation. There should be lawsuits and fines against this. Airports are not shelters, hotels, or halfway houses for illegal aliens to shack up and loiter! Send them back!ILLEGAL ALIENS HAVE "BROKEN" OUR IMMIGRATION SYSTEM DO NOT REWARD THEM - DEPORT THEM ALL - 01-25-2024, 06:02 PM [#9](https://www.alipac.us/f12/breaking-trump-calls-all-willing-state-governors-deploy-their-national-guards-416418/#post1745944) [Charlie Kirk](https://twitter.com/charliekirk11) [@charliekirk11](https://twitter.com/charliekirk11) We all owe a debt of gratitude to Governor Greg Abbott and the state of Texas for finally saying enough is enough and holding the line against a lawless president and a treasonous federal government. But Texas shouldn't have to do it alone. All Red State governors should rally behind Texas and defend our national sovereignty. Every state is a border state so every state should help shoulder the burden. [3:39 PM · Jan 24, 2024](https://twitter.com/charliekirk11/status/1750256967413854325) [https://twitter.com/charliekirk11/st...56967413854325](https://twitter.com/charliekirk11/status/1750256967413854325) Matthew 19:26 But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.
